title: Kaiserschmarrn with strawberry sauce
description: Kaiserschmarrn is an extremely delicious Austrian pudding, like a thick, light, buttery pancake, served with fruit.
ingredients: 1 tbsp Grand Marnier or other orange liqueur
50g/2oz butter, softened to butter the pans
175g/6oz caster sugar, plus 40g/1½oz for dusting the pans
4 free-range egg yolks, at room temperature
60g/2¼oz golden raisins, soaked in 4 tbsp white wine
